text: haneulgwa daejie issneun modeun geos eul hananimkkeseo algo gyesindaneun geos eul neohuineun alji moshaneunyo ses saie bimil iyagiga iss-eul su eobsnanihananimkkeseo geudeul gaunde nebeonjjaelogyesimyeo nes saieneun daseosbeonjjaelo gyesimyeo geuboda jeogji anihago manh jido anihago geudeul-i eodie iss deon hangsang geubunkkeseo geudeulgwa hamkke ha sieo simpan-ui nal geudeul haeng-wie daehan sasil-eul geudeul-ege malsseumhasigi ttaemun ila sillo hananim-eun modeun il-e jeon jijeonneunghasinola
